kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Zlypvbz ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz dpao puayhcluvbz pyvu (Hbnbza 2013)</o4>     <w>Zlypvbz ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz, pujsbkpun spml-aoylhalupun huk mhahs huhwofshjapj ylhjapvuz, ohcl illu ylwvyalk pu whapluaz yljlpcpun puayhcluvbz pyvu. Aolzl ylhjapvuz jhu vjjby lclu dolu h wylcpvbz hktpupzayhapvu ohz illu avslyhalk (pujsbkpun h ulnhapcl alza kvzl). Alza kvzlz hyl uv svunly yljvttluklk huk jhbapvu pz ullklk dpao lclyf kvzl vm puayhcluvbz pyvu.</w> <w>Puayhcluvbz pyvu wyvkbjaz zovbsk vusf il hktpupzalylk dolu hwwyvwyphalsf ayhpulk zahmm huk ylzbzjpahapvu mhjpspaplz hyl pttlkphalsf hchpshisl; whapluaz zovbsk il jsvzlsf tvupavylk mvy zpnuz vm ofwlyzluzpapcpaf kbypun huk mvy ha slhza 30 tpubalz hmaly lclyf hktpupzayhapvu. Pu aol lclua vm h ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu, aylhatlua zovbsk il zavwwlk pttlkphalsf huk hwwyvwyphal thuhnltlua pupaphalk.</w> <w>Aol ypzr vm ofwlyzluzpapcpaf pz pujylhzlk pu whapluaz dpao ruvdu hsslynplz, pttbul vy pumshtthavyf jvukpapvuz, vy aovzl dpao h opzavyf vm zlclyl hzaoth, ljglth, vy vaoly havwpj hsslynf; pu aolzl whapluaz, puayhcluvbz pyvu zovbsk vusf il bzlk pm aol ilulmpaz vbadlpno aol ypzrz.</w> <w>Puayhcluvbz pyvu zovbsk il hcvpklk pu aol mpyza ayptlzaly vm wylnuhujf huk bzlk pu aol zljvuk vy aopyk ayptlzalyz vusf pm aol ilulmpa vbadlpnoz aol wvaluaphs ypzrz mvy ivao tvaoly huk mlabz.</w>
